page.title: 10HOUSEHOLD AMENITIES
page.content: Although the{Keighley}area has a lot of terraced houses nearly all have the complete range of amenities people have come to expect.A house without a bathroom would now be rare.In addition fitted kitchens are now much more common. In a typical {Keighley}terraced house the following amenities would be found:3 bedrooms,a bathroom with possibly a shower,a living room,a seperate dining room and kitchen or a dining kitchen with fitted kitchen units.Some houses would have central heating whilst others would rely on coal or gas fires.Double glazing has become more popular as windows are replaced. Electrical equipment would include; automatic washing machine, fridge- freezer,colour TV,video and music centre.
